articles.author: Pragya.Gupta
articles.title: Killer Fungus: A Threat To Amphibians Across Africa - Asiana Times
articles.description: Over the past two decades, an amphibian heart failure-causing fungus has spread throughout Africa, endangering the continent's amphibians.  Hundreds of amphibian species have been wiped off worldwide by chytridiomycosis, the worst vertebrate sickness ever ide…
articles.content:
Over the past two decades, an amphibian heart failure-causing fungus has spread throughout Africa, endangering the continent’s amphibians.
